body.bibl: Pratten, B. P. “Memoirs of Edessa and Other Ancient Syriac Documents.” In The Twelve Patriarchs, Excerpts and Epistles, the Clementina, Apocrypha, Decretals, Memoirs of Edessa and Syriac Documents, Remains of the First Ages, edited by Alexander Roberts, James Donaldson, and A.
